1:
This episode revolves around Twilight going to Ponyville to supervise the preperations for the Summer Sun Celebration and make friends. Twilight, however, is focusing on the impending return of The Mare on the Moon or Nightmare Moon.
 While making sure everything is going smoothly she meets Applejack, an apple farmer, Pinkie Pie, a baker at the local bakery, Fluttershy, a timid animal lover, Rarity, a fashion designer, and Rainbow Dash, a fast flying daredevil.
2: Twilight and her new friends team up to locate and use the Elements of Harmony on the newly returned Nightmare Moon.
